answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The most probable cause for burning and tingling sensation is neuropathy, a disorder of the nerves. It is a disorder of the nerves which causes numbness, tingling, unusual sensations and sometimes pain. Most common cause is diabetes. This happens with metabolic disorders, vitamin deficiencies, infections and traumatic injuries. The sensations need proper evaluation by your GP, please consult him for a neurological assessment.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
